subject: feat: add GitHub CLI setup script for API extraction
body:
Add scripts/setup-gh.sh to automate GitHub CLI installation and
authentication across different environments (Linux, macOS, WSL).

- Detects OS and uses appropriate package manager
- Supports interactive (browser) and non-interactive (token) auth
- Verifies API access after authentication
- Updates documentation with setup instructions

This enables the untested extract-api.js to be properly configured
and tested from any environment.
title: add GitHub CLI setup script for API extraction
